alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Palo Verde Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 1:41AM PST until December 15 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Palo Verde Valley, Salton Sea, Imperial Valley, Western Imperial County, Southeastern Imperial County, Chuckwalla Mountains and Chuckwalla Valley. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Palo Verde Valley; Salton Sea
